extendedIngredients.name: bottle gourd
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 Liter Bottle Sierra Mist, Sprite or 7-up, chilled

extendedIngredients.name: canned pineapple
extendedIngredients.originalString: Pineapple slices for garnish (canned or fresh)

extendedIngredients.name: ice cream
extendedIngredients.originalString: 6-8 scoops Raspberry Sherbet Ice cream, or any flavor you have available
metaInformation: or any flavor you have available

extendedIngredients.name: lemonade
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 Fruit punch can, or pink lemonade, thawed in the fridge

extendedIngredients.name: pineapple juice
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 Pineapple juice can, thawed in the fridge

extendedIngredients.name: raspberries
extendedIngredients.originalString: Fresh or frozen raspberries for garnish

recipes.title: Raspberry Sherbet Party Punch

winePairing.pairingText: Frozen Dessert on the menu? Try pairing with Port, Moscato d'Asti, and Cream Sherry. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. The Giessinger Surrender Chocolate Strawberry Port with a 5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 50 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Giessinger Surrender Chocolate Strawberry Port
productMatches.description: It is when we Surrender to the power and the long-lived beauty of the mind without regards to the short-lived physical beauty that we experience satisfaction. Surrendering to pains may be the ultimate learning and humbling experience. After all, we need Forgiveness to Surrender to Passion. Syrah Port wine with natural flavors of chocolate and berries. Ice cream on wheels. AU PLAISIR!!

recipes.instructions: Pre-scoop ice cream and place on a baking dish lined with plastic wrap. Freeze and add ice cream just before serving so it remains frozen in the punch.In a punch bowl, combine: 2 juice cans. Pour in Sierra Mist and Club Soda and gently stir until combined.Add pineapple slices and raspberries if using and top with scooped sherbet just before serving. The ice cream will keep it chilled.

steps.step: Pre-scoop ice cream and place on a baking dish lined with plastic wrap. Freeze and add ice cream just before serving so it remains frozen in the punch.In a punch bowl, combine: 2 juice cans.
Pour in Sierra Mist and Club Soda and gently stir until combined.
Add pineapple slices and raspberries if using and top with scooped sherbet just before serving. The ice cream will keep it chilled.
